answers.answer: I am not a doctor.  I'm on an aspirin a day as well as Lisinopril and Metformin - both prescription meds.  Have you discussed this with your doctor?  A call to the office should be sufficient or a question to the pharmacist if you're in the drug store.  Better to get an expert's opinion.

question: I have HBP and Diabetes and take these pills above.
title: Is it oaky to take any Tylenol with Lisinopril and Metformin?
